institution_name: University of Tasmania International Pathway College

course_content.core:
Course structure: 4 core Business units
1 core English for Academic Purposes unit
3 optional units (depending on major) 4 core Business units 1 core English for Academic Purposes unit 3 optional units (depending on major)  Core units: Complete the following 5 units (62.5 credit points) Core units: XPD101 – People and Organisations
XPD102 – Introduction to Markets and the Economy
XPD105 – Data Analysis for Business
XPD106 – Accounting & Accountability
XPD150 – English for Academic Purposes XPD101 – People and Organisations XPD102 – Introduction to Markets and the Economy XPD105 – Data Analysis for Business XPD106 – Accounting & Accountability XPD150 – English for Academic Purposes

Core units: Complete the following 8 units Core units: XPD109 Introduction to Management
XPD113 Data Networks and Security
XPD119 Database Fundamentals
XPD124 Programming Fundamentals
XPD126 Programming
XPD129 Data Handling and Statistics
XPD150 English for Academic Purposes
XPD151 Introduction to University Mathematics XPD109 Introduction to Management XPD113 Data Networks and Security XPD119 Database Fundamentals XPD124 Programming Fundamentals XPD126 Programming XPD129 Data Handling and Statistics XPD150 English for Academic Purposes XPD151 Introduction to University Mathematics

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Aggregate of 20 points or less across 5 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: 3 Passes (C) at GCSEs.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc

course_content.core: Course Structure 8 units over two semesters (4 core + 4 elective) Core Units English 1 English 2 English 3 Foundation Mathematics  Stream Units ARTS Compulsory Units Choose a minimum of three from: Psychology Design & Society Statistics Media Studies Recommended Other Stream Unit Marketing Design & Strategy  BUSINESS Compulsory Units Choose a minimum of three from: Macroeconomics Microeconomics Marketing Design & Strategy Statistics Recommended Other Stream Unit Media Studies Design & Society  LAW Compulsory Units Choose a minimum of three from: Psychology Macroeconomics Microeconomics Statistics Recommended Other Stream Unit Marketing Design & Strategy Media Studies Design & Society

O-Level.text: 3 Passes (C) at GCSEs.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc

course_content.core:
Course Structure 8 units over two semesters (4 core + 4 elective)  Core Units English 1 
English 2 
English 3 
Foundation Mathematics English 1 English 2 English 3 Foundation Mathematics  Stream Units  LIFE SCIENCE Compulsory Units Chemistry
Statistics
Psychology Chemistry Statistics Psychology Recommended Other Stream Unit Calculus
Physics Calculus Physics Additional Units Requirements for Specific Degrees Advanced Diploma of Applied Science (Nautical Science) and Advanced Diploma of Applied Science (Marine Engineering) require Statistics and either Physics or Chemistry 
Bachelor of Surveying and Spatial Sciences requires Statistics and Calculus
Bachelor of Nutrition Science requires Statistics
Bachelor of Exercise and Sports Science requires Statistics 
Bachelor of Medical Science and Doctor of Medicine requires Chemistry Advanced Diploma of Applied Science (Nautical Science) and Advanced Diploma of Applied Science (Marine Engineering) require Statistics and either Physics or Chemistry Bachelor of Surveying and Spatial Sciences requires Statistics and Calculus Bachelor of Nutrition Science requires Statistics Bachelor of Exercise and Sports Science requires Statistics Bachelor of Medical Science and Doctor of Medicine requires Chemistry  PHYSICAL SCIENCE Compulsory Units Choose a minimum of three from: Calculus
Statistics
Chemistry
Physics Calculus Statistics Chemistry Physics Recommended Other Stream Unit Design & Society
Macroeconomics
Microeconomics Design & Society Macroeconomics Microeconomics Additional Units Requirements for Specific Degrees Bachelor of Engineering (Specialisation) with Honours requires Calculus and either Physics or Chemistry
Bachelor of Biomedicine requires Chemistry
Bachelor of Marine and Antarctic Science prerequisites are dependent on major. 
Marine Biology requires Chemistry and Statistics. Oceanography requires Calculus and Physics. 
Bachelor of Pharmacy with Honours requires Chemistry and Statistics Bachelor of Engineering (Specialisation) with Honours requires Calculus and either Physics or Chemistry Bachelor of Biomedicine requires Chemistry Bachelor of Marine and Antarctic Science prerequisites are dependent on major. Marine Biology requires Chemistry and Statistics. Oceanography requires Calculus and Physics. Bachelor of Pharmacy with Honours requires Chemistry and Statistics

SPM.text: Aggregate of 20 points or less across 5 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc

O-Level.text: 3 Passes (C) at GCSEs.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc
